name: Adrasan Boat Tour
short-description: Marvel at the breathtakingly beautiful scenery, swim in clear water near Adrasan, and enjoy a delicious lunch on the boat.

name: Kemer Boat Tour
short-description: Get out into nature on a boat trip from Antalya. Explore Suluada Island, cruise through Akseki Bay, and visit the mythical Love Cave for a refreshingly cool swim.

name: Aspendos Tour
short-description: Journey into the past as you discover the ancient citiy of Aspendos on this guided tour from Antalya. Explore the ruins of Roman architecture.

name: Myra Tour
short-description: Visit the ancient city of Myra and its theater, the church of Saint Nicholas (Christmas)

name: Köprülü Canyon Rafting
short-description: Unleash your inner adventurer and conquer 10 exhilarating rapids on a 14-kilometer rafting journey in the stunning Köprülü Canyon from Side.

name: Side Jeep Tour
short-description: With our Jeep Safari Tour you will get to know Side’s countryside, while admiring the spectacular scenery that Mountains form. Visit historical points of interest, swim in Green lake and much more.

name: Xanthos and Patara
short-description: Start this day tour from Kalkan. Explore the ancient Xanthos City and Patara Beach, the longest beach in Turkey.

name: Kaputas Beach
short-description: Hello

name: Scuba Diving
short-description: Embark on an unforgettable diving adventure in Antalya! Suitable for beginners and experienced divers, includes equipment training, two dives, lunch, and transfers. Explore Kemer's crystal waters

name: JetSki
short-description: Take in the amazing and jaw-dropping view of the Antalya from the sea on a 30-minute Jet Ski tour. Drive your Jet ski and enjoy maximum freedom by the sea and explore Antalya's' waterfront.

name: Paragliding
short-description: Enjoy the thrill in the air It is an unique feeling to look at the world from above Experience the feeling of freedom

name: Snorkling
short-description: Embark on a private or small-group guided snorkeling tour in Antalya. Go snorkeling in the crystal clear waters and marvel at the colorful fish and sea turtles.

name: Land of Legends
short-description: Experience uninterrupted adrenaline and high excitement with an entrance ticket to the Land of Legends Theme Park in Turkey, located in Belek.

name: Perge Tour
short-description: Go on a day tour that will take you to some of the most significant ancient Roman sites in the region. See the ancient city of Perge.

name: Side City Tour
short-description: Journey into the past as you discover the ancient citiy of Side on this guided tour from Antalya. Explore the ruins of Roman architecture and go for a dip in a waterfall.Hello

name: Culinary Tour
short-description: Fill your belly to the brim with fantastic Turkish flavors on a guided  tour of the best food on every side of Antalya. Make 8-9 stops with a variety of delicious samples at each one.

name: Antalya City Tour
short-description: Experience great views of the Mediterranean Sea and Antalya City with a scenic cable-car ride. You'll also visit two of the most popular waterfalls of city, the Düden and Karpuz Kaldıran waterfalls.

name: Antalya Aquarium
short-description: Spend the day at one of the largest aquariums in the world with a full-day ticket to the Antalya Aquarium, and be inspired and entertained by the world’s marine life.

name: Kekova tour
short-description: Discover Lycia's ancient wonders from Demre to Kekova: explore ruins, visit St. Nicholas Church, and cruise the stunning Kekova waters.

name: Fire of Anatolia Show
short-description: Hello
